title: 移民啦！ 加拿大公司請人

replies.msg:
We are looking for full time, energetic, and driven General Labourers to support our client in their Richmond operations facility. Our Client is huge on providing a safe and kind work facility with a diverse and unique team environment.
We are offering:
• A healthy and safe workplace culture
• Continuous growth and opportunity for work and getting hired on full time!
• A workplace with modern and well-maintained equipment
Job Duties
• Proactively participate in a strong safety culture
• Working in a safe manner
• Be super punctual and have excellent attendance
• General yard clean-up and maintenance of the site
• This is an outside job and so layer's and layers and prep for the ever changing BC weather!!
• Safety footwear and gear must be worn
• Other duties as assigned
Requirements
• Ability to work in a team environment
• Be a Self-starter, motivated and able to multi-task
• Strong ability to follow direction, stay safe and suggest ways to make things better!

16.25 per hour
